name: barcode-generator
description: Generates barcodes form inventory files for the Dalat Biology laboratory

scripts.build: npx tsc -p src && node src/esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.build-run: npx tsc -p src && node src/esbuild.config.mjs production && node out/bundle/main.js
scripts.mon: nodemon -x "npx ts-node src/src/main.ts out/pdfs" -w src -e ts
scripts.mon-transpile: nodemon -x "npm run transpile && node out/build/main.js out/pdfs" -w src -e ts
scripts.mon-bundle: nodemon -x "npm run transpile && npm run bundle-dev && node out/bundle/main.js out/pdfs" -w src -e ts

author: Trevor Nichols
